scripts.test-js: rm -rf build* && npm run build && cp -r spec/support dist/spec && jasmine --config=dist/spec/support/jasmine-js.json
scripts.prettier: npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma none --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120 --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*"
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build && npm test && npm run test-js
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build
